subject: Football
College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: West Virginia quarterback Pat White ran for 156 yards, and he threw for 144 to single-handedly generate almost as much offense as the entire Rutgers team on Saturday.
